summary:
This mod gives you three sets of catsuit with additional options for a lot of mixing.
The sets are named Terra, for the kinky, Luna based around the 80s anime and
lastly Stella, which is pure early 2000 sci-fi look.
descriptionHtml:
Please read important and installation sections !

This mod gives you three sets of catsuit with additional options for
a lot of mixing.
The sets are named Terra, for the kinky, Luna based around the 80s anime and
lastly Stella, which is pure early 2000 sci-fi look.

It is not lore friendly and is not meant to be.

Either construct it at the forge (leather) use the help command and give it
to yourself :)

For anyone familiar with my earlier work will quickly see that this is a remake
of the Spearhead catsuit with stuff from other mods (by me) thrown in the mix.
Even so, it has many new features and looks.

Why did I make this ?
For fun mostly but one important feature was the driving factor.
Make meshes that are flexible for reuse without too much blender work for
future mods and make two layers of meshes so close to the skin as possible
without causing clipping.

All screenshots and this description sections is included in the package.

Important notes:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Not lore friendly AT ALL and kind of NSFW !!!

Package comes with two esp files, one for none HDT and one for HDT.
(Read the installation section !!!)

Based off the CBBE v3 body    [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?[/url]
Weight 0 and 1 support but no bounce or extra bones support.

For the heeled boots you need at least SKSE, and HDT HH system.
    SKSE:        [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url]
    SkyUI:        [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?[/url]
    HDT HH:        [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?[/url]
Height for the platform is set to 8.7, high heels to 5.7.

While neither CBBE body or HDT HH with SKSE is required to be able to
use my mod.
Without CBBE body you will experience clipping issues between bodyparts.
Without HDT HH the heeled boots will sink into the ground.
(I have made regular boots for those that wish to use this without heels).

Can be smithed and tempered. It is categorized as Leather.

Minor clipping when used in certain poses.
Might be others but I have not seen any under standard gameplay.
Long eyelash mesh will clip through the glasses but is not disruptive.

Headgear comes in both helmets and circlets.

If you use stockings and Terra catsuit at the same time they will
cause transparancy issues.
I have no idea if it is possible to solve with flag combination in the nif.

If you wish to edit or change anything with the creationkit all my items
are named BBD... and is located under Armor/Addon and Constructible Objects.

If you don't like it, don't use it, it's optional !!!

I'm not going to make any changes or additions to it !

Type help "nova" 0 to get all the item codes in game.


Video review by vatiwah:
[youtube]ABzoOohpBEE[/youtube]


================================================================================
    Installation
================================================================================

Copy the BBD_Nova.esp and BBD_Nova.bsa and place it in
the Skyrim data folder.
(C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\data)
Make sure it is selected during load.

If you use the files from the data folder you will use the esp files that DO NOT
use HDT.
In the Options folder you have two other folders, HDT (HighHeel) and NoneHDT.
In each of these folders you find one BBD_Nova.esp.
Copy the one from respective folder to your Skyrim data folder based on if you
use HDT or not.
You can always use the NoneHDT even if you have HDT installed but heigh will
not be automatically applied to the heeled boots.
Game will most likely CTD if you use the HDT version without HDT installed.
